title: Crouching at the door

abstract: Sibling rivalry and its darker side
description: Andy is constantly being compared unfavourably to his younger brother and the pressure has built up...This film looks at the dark, destructive nature of sibling rivalry and the unconscious cruelty of family expectations. Cast: Mitchell McMahon, James Mashford, Alan Cinis, Karen Colston.
